description: Vertex AI GenAI Evaluation SDK - Agent Input Format
note: This format is used with client.evals.run_inference() for deployed agents

dataset_rows.prompt: Calculate 8 times 7 and then divide by 2

usage_example:
import pandas as pd
from vertexai import types

eval_df = pd.DataFrame({
    'prompt': ['What is 25 plus 17?', 'Divide 100 by 5'],
    'session_inputs': [
        types.evals.SessionInput(user_id='user_001', state={}),
        types.evals.SessionInput(user_id='user_002', state={})
    ]
})

# Run inference on deployed agent
result = client.evals.run_inference(
    agent='projects/xxx/locations/xxx/agents/xxx',
    src=eval_df
)
